newsitem.title: DENMARK: Danish shares start unchanged, correction ahead.
newsitem.headline: Danish shares start unchanged, correction ahead.

text.p: Danish share prices opened unchanged on Monday, with dealers seeing last week's negative correction continuing.

"Last week's correction will go on with prices falling undramatically during the course of the day's trading. The downward trend could persist until we begin getting the first interim corporate results in August," one dealer said.
The KFX top-20 index was unchanged at 189.29 at 0715 GMT, after closing 1.30 point lower on Friday.
